title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner with a REST API and CLI for macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API (npm: ollama).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API (PyPI: ollama).

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs and chat models.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, dark mode).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama (Maven Central: ollama4j).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper in Go for pulling, listing, and deleting Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub-Copilot-style suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot component that talks to local Ollama.

title: ollama-node
summary: Community Node.js client for Ollama with ESM and CommonJS builds.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app for chatting with Ollama models via WebSockets.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat interface that connects to Ollama with session memory.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with both sync and async APIs (NuGet: Ollama).

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM completions via Ollama inside notes.

title: ollama-rustic
summary: Alternative Rust client focused on ergonomic model and chat APIs.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators and embedders.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel package providing a fluent wrapper around the Ollama API.
